testCase.requirementText: Reference to the digital provenance metadata file stored in the “metadata” section of the IP.
testCase.description: For each digiprovMD element there should be a mdRef-element located within the element. According to the METS schema it is optional but the CSIP35 tightens this and states that there should be a mdRef-element. According to the schema there can only be one mdRef-element per digiprocMD-element.

rule.description: The digiprovMD should have a mdRef-element

error.message: The digiprovMD-element should have a mdRef-element

package.name: IP_amdSec_missing_mdRef_element
package.description: The package has an empty digiprovMD-element
